channel.title: PROPOSAL: Rank choice meeting times for the weekend SocialCG Meeting
channel.description:
(via https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/2021-05-07-socialcg-meeting/1697/7?u=bengo)
People can submit votes or ranked choices here.
PROPOSAL: move Saturday meetings later to accommodate restful Saturday mornings (and attendance) for US time zones like PDT. Encourage people to rank choice (ignore the date, just time):
1. status quo [date=2021-05-07 time=16:00:00 timezone="UTC"]
2. [date=2021-05-28 time=17:00:00 timezone="UTC"] 3. [date=2021-05-28 time=18:00:00 timezone="UTC"] 4. [date=2021-05-28 time=19:00:00 timezone="UTC"] 5. [date=2021-05-28 time=20:00:00 timezone="UTC"] 6. Sunday instead of Saturday (if this is ranked highly, we can revote with times)
# Please vote below:
[poll type=regular results=always chartType=bar] # Vote for your preferred option from the list above * 1 * 2 * 3 * 4 * 5 * 6 [/poll]

item.title: PROPOSAL: Rank choice meeting times for the weekend SocialCG Meeting
item.dc:creator: bengo
item.description:
(via 2021-05-07 SocialCG Meeting - #7 by bengo)

People can submit votes or ranked choices here.

PROPOSAL: move Saturday meetings later to accommodate restful Saturday mornings (and attendance) for US time zones like PDT. Encourage people to rank choice (ignore the date, just time):

  1. status quo 2021-05-07T16:00:00Z

  2. 2021-05-28T17:00:00Z

  3. 2021-05-28T18:00:00Z

  4. 2021-05-28T19:00:00Z

  5. 2021-05-28T20:00:00Z

  6. Sunday instead of Saturday (if this is ranked highly, we can revote with times)

Please vote below:

Vote for your preferred option from the list above
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • 6

0 voters

Read full topic
item.source: PROPOSAL: Rank choice meeting times for the weekend SocialCG Meeting
